short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep track of your sleeping and naps and subtract napping time from a bank.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep track of how much you sleep or nap each day by subtracting naptime out of a bank whenever you nap. You get a set amount of naptime each day (depending on your plan) as well as a starting buffer. Make sure you don't sleep longer than your remaining time!
